thread.title: 'NBA 2K16' Locker Codes & Guides Out, 'NBA 2K15' Players To Get Special Points

title: 'NBA 2K16' Locker Codes & Guides Out, 'NBA 2K15' Players To Get Special Points
text: 'NBA 2K16' Locker Codes & Guides Out, 'NBA 2K15' Players To Get Special Points Tuesday, 13 October 2015 (15 minutes ago) 2K has released the Locker Codes & guides for NBA 2K16. The time to get the final cheats and locker codes for "NBA 2K15" is over as "NBA 2K16" has officially arrived. Posting the locker codes on Twitter, 2K Sports told relieved fans of the game that they will also get special points for "NBA 2K15."
